alert.note: Alert for Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 8:50AM CDT until May 20 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River near Sweeny affecting Brazoria County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River Near East Bernard affecting Austin, Fort Bend, Colorado and Wharton Counties. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Fort Bend, Brazoria and Wharton Counties. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Sweeny, Boling... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Bernard River near Sweeny. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water is over the lowest platform at the Phillips Terminal near Sweeny. Hanson Park begins to flood. At 7.5 feet, Lazy G RV Boat Ramp takes on water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Thursday was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.4 feet on 12/14/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun San Bernard River Sweeny 7.0 7.2 Thu 7 am CDT 7.5 6.7 4.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM CDT.
